reviewText: I caught a little of this movie a few years back on tv and then found it recently by accident on Amazon.  the price was fantastic so I bought it.  It turned out to be extremely funny.  Super cheesy but if you are into that you will enjoy it.  I can't say much more without giving it away but as far as mockumentarys go it is great.

reviewerName: Bridget Niki "yoga, chemistry, but mainly chi...
reviewText: I laughed out loud!  I think what makes this movie hilarious is that you know one guy/girl JUST like that.  Or you chuckle because you HATE when *that* happens. Also .... you aren't expecting this movie to be funny because its straight to DVD so it kind of hits you out of nowhere. I mean, if you pop in a straight to DVD, you're probably not expecting something better than the big screen.  (sidenote: big screen movies are all the same now ... so previous statement is becoming less applicable to current movies).The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down - think Cant Hardly Wait but with hipsters, drugs, and sex.The DVD has narration describing various party goers throughout a hard night of getting into clubs, getting drugs, and getting laid.  The narrator shells out tons of tips/potential dangers; he discusses the art of mastering the night life, how to get rid of a one night stand, the subtleties of drug dealer time, how to roll a joint, how to tell the difference between fun drugs and "sketchy" drugs, how to get into clubs, how to master the after party.  I think you'll know immediately if you like the movie or not.  I personally think the movie looked very well put together for straight to DVD.  I can see aspects of the film that might not make it pleasurable to watch in a theater.  But that doesnt make this a bad film thats not worth your time - definitely better scriptwriting than a Steven Segal flick, for sure.If you're still wondering, I think the movie is fairly represented by the trailer.  If you like the vibe of the trailer ... then risk it and get this DVD; its funny!!(And, as far as straight to DVD comedies ... this might challengeSex Driveas my favorite)
summary: they dont make straight dvd like they used to

reviewText: Fantasize all you want but if you want to see what it's like in LA at night, this is the movie! It's hysterical because it is so true. I can laugh out of embarassment, how I have been in these situations, how I have said these same things and done these same things. Embrace it or hide your face, it's hysterical.
summary: Must See if you live in LA!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is the kind of edgy and original independent film I like to find when I rent something I've never heard of. It's a very funny and unapologetically hedonistic guide to partying in the bars, clubs and private parties of Hollywood. Done in a mock documentary style, the narrators use the absurdly serious and pedantic tone of educational movies shown in schools -the kind that warn against the very kind of behavior shown in this movie.This movie is done as a "how to" guide to surviving a nightlife of drinking, drug use and casual sex. Needless to say, if a humorous approach to these subjects, along with lots of bad language, is something that offends you, you should not see this film. There are sequences showing a bouncer school, where the bouncer trainees learn how to look properly menacing, a lesson in the etiquette of passing around marijuana joints, and tips on how to sneak into invitation-only events. This is not a profoundly meaningful film, nor an illustration of the most responsible way to live your life on a regular basis, but it's an honest and hilarious study of the subculture of serious partiers.
Title: N/A
